item.title: DHL Cargo Plane Crashes Near Airport in Lithuania, Killing 1
item.description: The crash near Vilnius Airport sparked a fire in a residential area, officials said. One person on board was killed and three others were hospitalized...

item.title: DHL Cargo Plane Crashes Into Homes
item.description: Thick smoke rose from a residential area near an airport in Vilnius, Lithuania, after the plane crashed.

item.title: Storm Bert Batters UK With Rain and Fierce Winds, Killing at Least 3
item.description: Torrential rain doused most of the country, stymying travel and leading to widespread flooding, landslides, fallen trees and power outages.

item.title: Israel and Hezbollah Mount New Attacks Amid Cease-Fire Talks
item.description: Rockets flew on both sides of the Israel-Lebanon border even as diplomats tried to finalize a truce.

item.title: Crowds Watch Israeli Airstrikes from a Beirut Hillside
item.description: Every night, dozens gather at the hillside to watch airstrikes rain down on the city’s southern suburbs. The ritual offers a window into the war — and...
